title: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
subtitle: Soul Extraction
series: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
tagline: Some hostels are a bargain. Others cost you your life.

synopsis.short: A burnout-suffering wellness influencer signs up for a "soul cleansing" ceremony at a Balinese hostel, not realizing the shaman is actually harvesting souls to feed an ancient hunger deity.

death_teaser: She came to find herself. Something else found her first.
